Package com.ltsllc.miranda.node.states

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ConnectingState
    Created by Clark on 1/21/2017.
    JoiningState
    A node which has sent a join message enters this state and remains here until it receives a reply.
    NewNodeState
    When a node is added via a connect it enters this state, waiting for a join message.
    NodeDisconnectingState
    Waiting for a response to a StopWireMessage
    NodeIncomingStartState
    A node enters this state when we get a new connection from the ConnectionListener.
    NodeReadyState
    Created by Clark on 1/29/2017.
    NodeStartState
    A new node enters this state when it is trying to connect to a remote system.
    NodeState
    Created by Clark on 1/29/2017.
    NodeStoppingState
    A cluster node that is shutting down.
    RetryingState
    A node that can't connect to a remote system enters this state.
    TestConnectingState
    Created by Clark on 3/21/2017.
    TesterNodeState  
    TestJoiningState
    Created by Clark on 3/22/2017.
    TestNewNodeState
    Created by Clark on 3/22/2017.
    TestNodeDisconnectingState
    Created by Clark on 3/22/2017.
    TestNodeIncomingStartState
    Created by Clark on 3/22/2017.
    TestNodeReadyState
    Created by Clark on 3/23/2017.
    TestNodeStartState
    Created by Clark on 3/23/2017.
    TestNodeState
    Created by Clark on 3/21/2017.
    TestNodeStoppingState
    Created by Clark on 3/23/2017.
    TestRetryingState
    Created by Clark on 3/23/2017.
